text:
Hello everyone.  The question is about localization of custom quotes in Beta version.

QUOTE.hs_language is the name of variable, how can we localize the custom quotes texts, especially the translations of date and months?

Anyone know of a way that I can load a multi-lang header/footer on a system page based off of url params?

I have multi-lang header and footer’s set up for the pages. If a search is on German page I can pass a URL param for the language but I don’t know of a way to force my page to load the german version of a global module. Is that a thing?
My first thought would be smart content within the global module based on IP location... Could think of a few weird/hacky solutions there using JS, but I'd try and keep things simple first.
The question — more or less, is “If I have a global module with translated content, can I force it to load a specific langauge variant in hubl”
